Description: One point on the time axis
Part of the time axis limited by two instants
A quantity characterizing a time interval
Ordered sequence of events in the past
Geocentric Coordinate Time - coordinate time at Earth's center
International Atomic Time - primary physically realized time standard
Universal Time - Earth Rotation Angle scaled to mean solar time
Coordinated Universal Time - atomic time scale approximating UT1
Barycentric Coordinate Time - coordinate time at solar system barycenter
Terrestrial Dynamical Time - replaced by TT
Barycentric Dynamical Time - dynamical time at barycenter
True solar time based on actual sun position
Time with Z designator for UTC
Date and time separated by space
